website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for hard-core yogis who sweat a lot during practice.
pros: Rave reviews for fitting perfectly over one's yoga mat, and acting as a sponge for sweat
Unlike some other models, this design has corner pockets you can tuck your mat into, so the mat doesn't get loose during your practice
Bottom side of towel grips to mat
The more the towel gets wet with sweat, the more it grips to the mat
Towel comes with 2 awesome free perks – a carry-bag for the towel, your keys and cell phone in addition to a small spray bottle to get your towel a little wet (and sticky) before starting practice
cons: The towel tends to shrink in the dryer, it is best to air dry after washing

customer_reviews.title: Great towels if you sweat a lot...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these towels and have been using them for about 4 months. I sweat a lot during hot yoga and these towels soak it all up so I don't have to constantly wipe the yoga mat. The seller recommends spraying water on the towels prior to use so they're not slippery and I've been doing that prior to each use. If you don't, they are a little slippery. The first two towels I bought didn't come with a little spray bottle but the third one did.
customer_reviews.author: Doraemon

customer_reviews.title: Late last night I got an email from the seller which says they recommend air drying the towel to avoid shrinkage
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this mat towel - the packaging for the towel specifically states it is dryer safe under "Use & Care". I washed and dried the towel after receiving it and prior to using it for the first time this morning. Late last night I got an email from the seller which says they recommend air drying the towel to avoid shrinkage! I checked the towel on my mat and sure enough it shrunk about 2", making it unusable because causes the ends of the mat to curl in as it is too short now. Nice quality overall, just don't dry it! I'm returning it given it is now too short for my mat.
customer_reviews.author: LRez57

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months, it now slips.
customer_reviews.text: *Update* I’ve been using the towel 3x/week for 4 months in hot yoga and it is not nearly as grippy as it was. My hands slide in the beginning of class, and also at the end. It’s becoming incredibly frustrating. Looks like I will have to buy another yogitoes towel. Original post: I have a standard Gaiam mat and this is really long. I don’t like folding it over one edge of my mat because then the one side has a bump. It is more non-slip than the mangofit, but still I like my Yogitoes better. I have to adjust this one sometimes during hot yoga,but not too frequently that it’s annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great hot yoga towel!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this yoga towel (she had various ones and this was her favorite) and it really does a great job in the hot yoga room. Does not slip. The grip is great and didn't budge on my yoga mat. Washes well (i followed the washing directions: line dry. No bleach or softeners. And i washed it literally 7 days in a row and shows no sign of wear.) It didn't cost a fortune like some other brands. Totally recommend this one... i am probably gonna pick up a second soon. I have the dark grey because at the time of purchase it was the cheapest of all the colors. It comes with a carry bag/pouch.
customer_reviews.author: CanalHJ

customer_reviews.title: Non- Slip!
customer_reviews.text: Absolultey recommend it. It was a little longer than my yoga mat, but I was stil able to lock the mat in place and it did not move at all during my Hot Hatha Yoga Class.I'm excited to see if it will stay put for Power Vinyasa next, but I'm sure it will (I'll update later if it doesn't). This is a great mat for the price especialy compared to the $60+ for the yogitoes (which I also have).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Great towel but don't love the pockets
customer_reviews.text: The towel works great - it stays put on my mat till the end of class and is very absorbent. My boyfriend is very sweaty and will tend to have pools but the end of class with some towels, but this one did a good job dispersing the sweat so he could keep his grip. The only thing we didn't care for were the pockets. The tend to prevent it from laying flat at the ends. If your mat is the exact correct size, the pockets may be a blessing, but for us, they are a bit of a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: J West

customer_reviews.title: withstands high intensity hot body scupt
customer_reviews.text: Yoga towel fits 72x26 yoga mat. It does withstand high intensity hot (~100F) exercise routine. No problems with mountain climbers, jumping jacks- towel stayed put, and didn't wrinkle at all. I have a grey one, and you can see sweat marks on this color, however it doesn't bother me at all. For slower yoga (yin), it did slightly rub my top bare feet, this is were I gave 4 stars on softness. Weight is not heavy, but not feather light as well, at the end if you want it to be more sturdier it has to be somewhat toned. Overall I like it, and using it with no major complains
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME solution to sweaty and slippery hands and feet during yoga!
customer_reviews.text: I quickly realized during my very 1st yoga class that I needed something asap to prevent my apparently super sweaty hands and feet from slipping. Got this in time for my 2nd class and the difference was night and day. No more slipping! If that wasn't good enough on it's own, they throw in a carrying bag and spray bottle! (You're supposed to spray the towel before starting your routine to "activate" the non-slip properties? Sounded weird to me but worked perfectly!) Much better solution then wearing crazy looking toeless socks and gloves! Also love that i can just wash the towel now instead of having to constantly wipe down the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: The best yoga towel!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many yoga towels including Manduka and Gaiam brands. This towel is by far the best. I sweat and slip even in slower classes on rubber mats, so the silicone coating on the entire bottom side of the towel help keep me in alignment even in fast-paced hot vinyasa classes. It doesn't move around or bunch up like other towels I've used, plus it's large enough to fully cover a variety of mat sizes. I use this towel every time I practice now, and it's improved my practice so much because I don't have to worry about my hands slipping all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: akd32

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR HOT YOGIS!
customer_reviews.text: Buying these in EVERY color. This is the BEST yoga towel I have ever used! I practice bikram yoga regularly and this is the only towel that STAYS IN PLACE! It even has pockets for you to fold your mat into the towel for added security. Came with an empty spray bottle and carrying bag. Dries fast, absorbent, long, and durable! I LOVE these and you will too! These are better than my yogitoes towels!
customer_reviews.author: Tavasin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non-slip towel even in non-heated classes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in a regular vinyasa yoga class (non heated) so that I am not directly in contact with the studio's shared mats. I usually spray a little water on the mat before laying this towel. So far the mat doesn't shift or slip during yoga (which was my biggest concern while purchasing). This was the case even in the more vigorous classes. The mats in my studio are just slightly larger than this towel, therefore I cant use the corner pockets, but that hasn't caused any issues with the function of this towel. Very happy with the product. I wash it in the washing machine (warm cycle) and air dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestotravel

customer_reviews.title: Slipping hands and feet during hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This towel is not good for hot yoga when you need traction on both sides of the towel like down dog or even triangle. I use towel over mat for hot bikram 26x2 and hot flow. The towel stays put against the mat, but hands and feet get no traction against the towel whether wet or dry, despite the obvious texturing of the towel. Quite baffling, really. I have another towel with no obvious texture and both that and the plain mat are easier to hold poses on than this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Shortinthetoof

customer_reviews.title: No more slipping during yoga
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my yoga mat when I go I class that I know is going to be sweaty. Putting this on top of the mat helps prevent slippery hands and feet. Takes about 20 seconds to prepare: spray some water in your yoga mat (spray bottle included), put the “towel” on top, using the little pockets to make it stay (think of a fitted sheet). After use I wash it in mesh bag in cold water. Following the advice of others, I air dry it so it doesn’t shrink. It dries pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Moodmachine

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It's my only second mat towel for yoga. I really liked the corners - very useful in keeping the towel on the mat. I especially like the texture of the fabric that is more grippy under my hands and feet in yoga class than my previous pretty but smooth towel, therefore 5 star rating. I wish this towel was a bit smaller in size to fully employ the corners functionality, and more color choice or some design on fabric to make it even more enjoyable - without changing the fabric quality.
customer_reviews.author: LazyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sticky,  but not for long...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the towel, it was great. The ends slipped over my mat and with a little water, the towel gripped my mat just fine. However, after the first wash (in cold water, delicate cycle, Woolite) it started going south. My next class, the towel gripped my mat, but left a sticky residue on the mat which was difficult to get off. After washing again, there were little sticky balls stuck to everything else in the load. Several uses later, the ends are great for slipping over the end of the mat, but the grip is mostly gone. Not so great in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Best mat towel.
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different towels to find the best one without having to spend the money on Manduka and Yogitoes. To my surprise, for half the money, these towels are amazing. They hook around the corners of your mat to lock into place. Then, the wetter they get from sweat, the more tacky they are. There is no slip or slide. Only wash and dry. Do not use fabric softener. Also, avoid using lotion the day of your practice. Your hands and feet will stay firmly planted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The right mat for your Yoga!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first yoga mat and it just may be my last. This mat makes a world of difference. It’s soft, doesn’t move around and durable. I haven’t had one problem with this product and would recommend it to all of my friends. I also purchased a yoga towel that fits the length of the mat perfectly. I would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Shepard Davis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not for hot classes & sweat
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the chance to use this in a hot studio (covid-delayed) and it did not perform. It was around 100 degrees and 60% humidity so I sweat like a beast and this was sopping wet by the middle of class. It has great traction, I'll give it that but I need something that is going to dry the sweat since I don't want to be laying in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a mess after one wash
customer_reviews.text: After just one wash the silicone layer broke down leaving tons of white specks in my washing machine, clothes dryer, and on my other clothes in the wash. The towel shrank tremendously, and the pocket corners barely fit into the mat. I do hot yoga 4-5 times per week, so I use this towel in rotation with other towel brands. Compared to it's competitors, this towel is the thinnest material, the least absorbing, and the white speck problem makes it almost unusable in the wash. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BostonP

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my husband and myself when we wanted to try hot yoga. We wish we had ordered them a year ago! We now use them not only for hot yoga, but for our regular practice. They keep us from slipping, feel great on our feet and are beautiful! They are easy to care for- we hang them out to air dry after each sweaty use and wash them and air dry them once a week.They are a bit longer than what we need, but we just fold them under. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jan brewington

customer_reviews.title: Very good towel
customer_reviews.text: Very good towel for the hot and sweaty yoga sessions. It truly does better when moist , infact requires to be moistened at least in the areas where the hands and feet touch it most in order to reduce slippage. The towel is a perfect thing to travel with and use in gyms where you don't have your own mat and so works to cover the gym mats avoiding the 60 previous users perspiration residue and smell! The little carry bag is also very useful for storing small pocket items, and the pockets that help to hold the mat are a real improvement over my earlier mats.
customer_reviews.author: Loner

customer_reviews.title: Not great for I'm studio practice.
customer_reviews.text: Does fit nice onto mat and doesn't roll up from mat and is better than no towel for hot yoga when you're sweating. But sticks to itself when you pull it out of the bag (and makes a loud noise to peel apart in the quiet yoga studio before class). Sometimes sticks to mat as well. Slipper for feet and hands in downward dog and warrior poses, etc. Yes, they say you can spray it with water to improve traction, but not ideal in yoga studio and with how much you find you have to keep spraying. At home you might have time and might not feel so intrusive making all those adjustments, but not great for studio.
customer_reviews.author: jillcon

customer_reviews.title: NICE! Non-slip yoga towel! Recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: When I am considering buying this product , there were no reviews on this item so I was hesitant to buy but compared to other items-this function more complete, and look good quality. I took a chance&bought this. I love it! It is excellent quality. This Non-Slip Yoga Towel provides amazing grip for advanced yoga moves. I put it on my yoga mat or on the carpet when practice, Helps me keep poses by not sliding!The carrying bag is great too because it is large enough to put my towel and other things. I can't wait to use it for my Bikram class!
customer_reviews.author: Usam

customer_reviews.title: Works well to prevent slipping/sliding
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped promptly and is exactly as described. I really like the non-slip coating and it works much better than a microfiber towel. I decided that I am not so fond of the pocket for the mat corners; it does help to keep the towel in place but it also creates a ;little bump under your feet, That did not change my rating because it was exactly as described. It’s a perfect non-slip, non-bunch towel to avoid sliding on your mat no matter how sweaty you get!
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks in hot yoga classes. The size is great, and I LOVE the pocket for the end of the mat—really helps keep the towel in place. It’s grippy, absorbent, and lightweight. It isn’t particularly soft. Also, after a few weeks of use, I noticed in the last class it seemed a little less tacky. Might have been an anomaly though. We’ll see how it goes with a few more weeks of use...
customer_reviews.author: ELRusso

customer_reviews.title: Great towel and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased on of these Heathyoga towel and was very satisfied with it until a few washes later, I noticed that it was peeling a bit. It just so happens that Jenny from Heathyoga sent me an email asking how I was enjoying my tower. After I described to her what was happening, she sent me a new towel no questions asked. The new towel is made a bit differently and so far no peeling. Thank you Jenny for providing excellent customer service and to stand by your product!
customer_reviews.author: N. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 🧘‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: This towel is made of high quality materials. I’ve washed it once and let it air dry. Looks great and dries quickly. It has sewn edges that your mat will fit it so it stays in place. Just make sure you spray it with plenty of water. I really like the material and it’s beautiful. You could spend A LOT of money for a mat specifically for Power Yoga but this yoga towel works great.
customer_reviews.author: HDJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing yoga towel!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this towel. I have another towel and I had to consistently adjust it when doing yoga. But with this towel, even with it being bigger than my mat, it doesn't slip and I don't have to adjust it. It's awesome!! Even when I do sweat it absorbs my sweat and I won't slip in a flow class. I recommend it for anyone that sweats during regular and hot yoga if you want to be able to not worry about adjusting and slipping. I'm going to buy a second towel.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Very good mat - way better than some of the others
customer_reviews.text: I just got into yoga about 6 months ago and purchased couple of different styles of mat covers. This one is by far the best. It feels good as you work through your routine and grips well on your feet and hands. The ends have a flap that goes over your mat to prevent the cover from moving out of place. I had purchased another cover that was microfiber. That one smells after each use and doesn't feel as comfortable as this mat. This one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: roleplay

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for hot yoga!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hot yoga class and it works like a charm. The towel itself is thinner than I thought it would be but super absorbent with one-sided traction that goes on top of your yoga mat. It fits my yoga mat perfectly and the 4 corner ears give it extra security. The free towel bag is a huge perk, too-- fits your towel, keys, even water! For the price this is a great product and I'm very happy with my purchase. Even got a free "cooling towel" with mine, too! Thanks Heathyoga!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stephens

customer_reviews.title: One time use - have to throw away :(
customer_reviews.text: Overall I was really disappointed with this purchase given all the great reviews. I do yoga sculpt so it’s hot and you’re moving and jumping around a lot. After washing it (and not drying) the towel shrunk up a little and you can no longer use the pockets to keep it in place. It’s not sticky enough to stay put on its own so basically after using it once I have to throw it away. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: minnesnowta

customer_reviews.title: So very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga towel was perfect for Bikram. The towel is the perfect addition to my thicker Heathyoga mat too! It was super easy to set up, while trying to be super quiet to not disturb others. I’m blown away by everything that came with my towel, drawstring bag and a small spray bottle! There was noooo slipping at all, and it was 105 in there! I can’t wait to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Y. M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this towel! I am new to yoga and didn’t want to spend a ton of money on equipment. I workout from home and wanted something to lay on the carpet as my mat because the mat I had was way to slick for a good grip. It is perfect, doesn’t slip, and has good grip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps stop slipping on the yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: My palms always seem to slip on my yoga mat, even the more expensive ones that are supposed to prevent that. I bought the yoga towel to cover the mat and it really helped. But it does stretch out over time. So I looked for another alternative and I came across Yoga Paws. That's the solution I found to work best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I used this towel for hot yoga the same day I got it. It comes with a little spray bottle and a carrying bag that’s really nice. It fit on my mat well, although I feel like maybe my yoga mat is kinda short but the towel still stayed put my whole practice. Much better than either of the other 2 towels I have. The material feels different than my other towels, maybe not as soft but I’ll take the trade off for it not slipping all over my mat the whole hour. Overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in purple and the mint green/pink. Love the size (fits perfectly over standard yoga mats), colors, and carrying bag. The grip is also great for holding the towel in place on the mat. My only complaint is that the texture is somewhat rough and not as nonslip as you’d expect given the texture
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyJo

customer_reviews.title: No slip, all grip!
customer_reviews.text: The corner pocket design keeps this hot yoga towel in place for the entire duration of my practice. No need to spray the towel down to make it non-slip. Thirty days in and the material holds up well to daily machine washing. One caveat: Do not place in the dryer on high heat or it will shrink the corners and will not fit your mat. Low heat or line dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Good towel
customer_reviews.text: This towel works well for Bikram classes and stays put for the most part because the bottom is slightly sticky. It absorbs all my sweat, which is on the lighter side compared to some other students who drench their towels. The carrying bag is useful and made of the same fabric as the towel, minus the sticky underside. For Bikram I haven't used the spray bottle. This yoga towel is on the thinner side and has a waffle texture which is not as soft as some other towels. It air dries pretty quickly. I have a Manduka Pro mat and it covers most of the mat except about an inch on each side.
customer_reviews.author: foodi3

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat Towel
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat towel. It is actually my second one. I had to buy an additional one because I attend classes so often. Great quality. My first one has been washed countless times over the past year and has held up well. I do like the new one better because it fits my standard mat perfectly. My original mat was too long and I had to fold it under. Great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alia pavlinic

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Outstanding service.
customer_reviews.text: Got an email providing use and care instructions before it was delivered. Post purchase customer service was great - needed to exchange and they went out of the way to accommodate request. Fit my mat perfectly Pockets and grip kept the towel in place with no shifting. Sprayed a small amount of water on the towel at the start of class. Actually towel adds a bit of cushioning to my mat . Comes with a tiny spray bottle and a drawstring bag in the same material as the towel. Got one. Loved it. Got 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Great hot yoga towrl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that fits great, stays put, and absorbs my sweat during hot yoga. This is not like a normal towel as it has special grips on the side that touches your mat as well as pockets for corners. Comfy to lay on and totally supports your hot yoga practice. Washes well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pink Boarders
customer_reviews.text: Used the towel for the first time last night for HOT yoga, really impressed with how much liquid this towel can absorb. The only thing that's really not a BIG deal when ordering it you don't get to see the whole towel - the outline of the towel is in pink - took a little ribbing for it but all is good. Highly recommend this towel for ladies or men.....
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you sweat a TON like me...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TOWEL. Works great for all my yoga classes! It does shrink up a bit after the first wash, so I don't recommend fully drying (I take mine out when it's still a little damp and hang it). I actually use the carrying bag it came with as a face towel for yoga class! Great purchase for any sweaty Yogi's out there like me!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and not slippery
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. This got me through a hot sweaty 200 hour yoga teacher training over the summer and it's still going strong. Easy to fold. Doesn't slip much at all. Stays in place. It's just smaller than I'd like but I have a huge rubber mat. It will fit your standard mats but not mine. It's ok though I just lay it on top and it stays without the corners tucked through got power yoga classes. Can't obeat the price either. My fav shade of purple too
customer_reviews.author: jada

customer_reviews.title: A bit longer than the standard yoga mat but still GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat cover is AMAZING! It's a little longer than the standard size I believe (or at least my mat... which is pretty long), but its nothing you can't fold over or even do a quick stitch on! If your hands and feet tend to get sweaty during yoga, this is the item for you! It does not slip or move at all! You won't even feel like you have something extra on your mat, and it honestly keeps you cool during your workout. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure your mat before buying!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this comes with the bag and the bottle for mat cleaner. The towel itself adhered to my mat pretty well. I was excited that you could tuck the mat into it to keep it in place but it was the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: catharine carroll

customer_reviews.title: Slips over my mat easily. I give it a little spray before class ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comes in a pouch that fits in my yoga bag. Slips over my mat easily. I give it a little spray before class and while I have only used it a couple of times; it seems to help my grip without scrunching up. For a senior citizen it is giving me a more confidence to move between asanas and hold them with better balance.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Laska

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the Heathyoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling non slip towel for the soles of the feet but a little slippery when doing postures that use the sides of the feet. Nothing extreme though. I've discovered that you can't role up the mat with the towel attached at both ends. If you want to role it up you need to have one end loose.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Super slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be put on top of public mats. I generally do vinyasa yoga and I sweat really really easily. But I was slipping all over the place with this yoga towel. I believe you're supposed to spray it with water before use? But I didn't feel comfortable doing that in public. Returned
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, stable for most poses
customer_reviews.text: It fits quite well over the yoga mat and stays attached. It is made of a soft comfortable material that looks like it would dry pretty quick. I would have liked a little more grip under my hands for a downward dog but it was still stable enough through other poses. This included a small spray bottle which does help because the wetter the towel is the more grip it has. I really like it but it won't attach it to the front of the mat when I will be doing a lot of downward dog poses.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: grip!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt follow the step to wet the towel, mostly because i was running late. Even without the water the towel gave me the grip I've been needing in flow classes. The towel is just slightly longer than my mat. I’m super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: My towel came and it was just as described- the non-stick towel was perfect for a sweaty yoga session and didn't move at all through the entire class. I accidentally ordered the wrong size and the company worked with me to replace mine quickly and effectively. Will definitely be ordering from Heathyoga again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this Yoga towel!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is just the right size for my mat. No more fixing my towel, the pockets keep it in place! I can concentrate on my yoga and not the towel. It absorbed my sweat and provided a good grip. Love the little spray bottle it came with. Filled it with essential oils and witch hazel for organic yoga mat cleaner. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for lulumon mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have a lulumon mat. When I first used this towel it was a bit long, but after it’s first trip through the washer it shrunk a bit and now fits perfectly. I don’t get tangled up in it, it only bunches a little, and it doesn’t interfere with my practice. Love it. Little bag is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: brie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, they are both longer than my mat but I just fold over at the one end and it works fine stays in place and helps with slipping and sliding during hot yoga, spraying it with water helps as well. I would recommend if you are doing any hot yoga classes
customer_reviews.author: BrandiB4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a beach towel with my normal old yoga mat, and the towel would bunch up and I would also end up slipping around and just having a difficult time. But with this yoga towel, the rubber grips on the bottom keep the towel flat on my yoga mat, and the surface is also kind of grippy, so I have no problems doing hot yoga with sweaty palms since I don't even slip. This yoga mat is a perfect yoga mat for hot yoga. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dapper Dog

customer_reviews.title: The perfect yoga towel for hot yoga!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best yoga mat towel I’ve ever owned! It’s better than Yogi Toes and Uga because it stays in place! It also fits perfectly over my EcoPro Manduka yoga mat, and I love the bag as the extra gift! I bought this in blue and it’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Love

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mat and towel. They are both amazing. I use them for hot yoga. The extra width gives me a better stretch in child's pose. I love that the towel tucks under the mat for stability. The mat is the perfect thickness for the balancing postures. I sweat a great great deal and yet my mat always smells fresh. All of my other mats are going on Offer Up and the other yoga towels will be re-purposed. The customer service is amazing as well. I love this company and its products
customer_reviews.author: Leon C

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea
customer_reviews.text: I love how this towel has pockets that fit over the ends of my Manduka Lite Mat. It stayed in place nicely. The directions said not to dry, but I took the chance anyway because it was slightly larger then the mat. It did shrink a bit, but I was able to stretch it back well enough to lay flat. I’m only giving 4 stars because I think that the towel should be pre shrunk. Otherwise, I love this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Good towel. I like the bottle and bag it comes with. I have a prana yoga towel and I needed another towel since I’m doing hot yoga 4-5 days a week. I didn’t want to spend too much $. Found this towel with a great price point. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: The Towel smell:
customer_reviews.text: This particular Hearthyoga towel is not good quality, when is wet it smell very bad even after washing it. I drop baking soda in the machine when washed, it doesn't help with the smell. I am not satisfied with this product it doesn't live up to expectations. I paid $19.95 for Heathyoga I cannot use. And a towel I purchace for less with no name that is the one I am using, no smell. Thank, Jeanine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST YOGA TOWEL EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The design of this towel is perfect! The waffle texture really makes it non-slip. I never worry about losing my grip even during a fast paced flow. The best part is the fabric pieces that slide over the yoga mat to keep it in place. It works perfectly and does not require any re-adjustment after placing it. The towel is the perfect size for my Manduka Pro Mat! I love using it so much I bought another one to replace other towels I have that don't grip or stay in place. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C- Town

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners (and maybe more advanced too!)
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a beginner like me, great price too! I sweat a bit when I do yoga so this helps me keep my grip on the mat and not having me eat the floor like I almost did a few times before getting this. Definitely a good buy, couples well with the heathyoga mat I got too - 100% would say this is a great product combination if you're getting into yoga
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this yoga towel has the flap/pockets so I can tuck the mat into it. I am a sweaty, sweaty beast when I work out, even in regular non-hot yoga. This towel absorbs it all, and I do not slip. I have desire to accidentally slip into the splits anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa C. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Prevents slipping
customer_reviews.text: I prefer towels that really help you keep your feet from slipping during hot yoga and this mat is my favorite! I do a high intensity class with a lot of movement and weights so this mat is a must for me! I will buy more in the future - great value!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT IN DRYER
customer_reviews.text: I loved this towel the first time I used it. After its first sweaty use, I washed it following the care instructions. It instructed me to put in dryer and when I tried to use it the next day, it no longer fit over my Heathyoga mat. I am returning and ordering new because it was perfect for hot yoga. I just wanted to warn potential buyers not to put in dryer like it instructs - hang dry instead. It is a great product besides the inconvenience of it shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put and Soaks Up Sweat
customer_reviews.text: This yoga towel is working really well. I was a little worried when it first came because it doesn’t have a sticky backside, but I hook the little corners around my mat and it stays put. And it soaks up a lot of sweat when I do hot yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Montanaro

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: Wife started doing hot yoga and apparently you need a nice towel like this otherwise you sweat all over your yoga mat and a regular beach towel won't do the trick. Got this for her birthday, and she didn't return it. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: WestWorks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this towel!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga towel! I’d been frustrated with my other towel moving around so I ordered this one. It stays in place, absorbs sweat well and is stylish. Fits my Heath yoga mat (also love!) perfectly and the bag is helpful to carry the towel, my wallet and water bottle in. I’ll probably be ordering another one soon so I can alternate towels for my daily practice.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga towel
customer_reviews.text: Although this towel doesn't fit my mat perfectly, I can always fold it under for a better fit. It does seem to work better once it gets wet, and kind of bunches when I'm moving around throughout my practice, but overall I love it. The little bag makes a handy carrying case for not only my towel, but some mat wash in the spray bottle it comes with, as well as my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Maynor

customer_reviews.title: Once its wet no slipping
customer_reviews.text: This towel is great... so great I ordered 2 more for my hot yoga. The quick dry is too good, when I would spray my towel before hot yoga class started it would dry almost immediately. Howver, once I get a sweat going it gives me the no slip stability i need on my yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Oma Plata

customer_reviews.title: Moisten that thing
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Works best when you moisten it a bit, and if you're doing hot yoga, moisture won't be far behind. Oh, am I right? Yes, I think I am. Hoowee, hot yoga is HOT. And I'm not talking about instructors here -- the temperature of the room is actually quite warm. Hence "hot yoga." Heh.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Who Reads A Whole Lot

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this towel to use with the Heathyoga ProGrip Non Slip Yoga Mat with Alignment Lines, Revolutionary Wet-Grip Surface & Eco Friendly Material. Previously I was using a beach towel during hot yoga, and it would slide and bunch up. This towel slips over the ends of the mat, anchoring it in place. It grips to the mat, so my feet do not slide in certain poses. There is very minimal bunching of the towel on occasion. The towel covers the mat 99.8%. The width is just a bit short. Will most likely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love this yoga mat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this yoga mat cover a few times now. Fits my gyms mats perfectly, washes well and looks great! I've air dried it and dried on low and both work well. The "red" color is so pretty! It's like a well washed red, more pink without being obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: A bit long but the pockets at the ends are super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yoga mat towel! I use it for my hot yoga classes. It’s a bit long but I just tuck the end into the pocket and fold it back a bit and it works fine. The pockets are an AMAZING feature and I only have to adjust the towel a couple times in my hour session. Without this mat towel I’m constantly adjusting it over my mat.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: It does stop you from slipping
customer_reviews.text: I almost never give reviews, but this thing is life-changing. Yes, my hands and feet sweat during yoga which led to slipping. I had to wear gripping yoga socks. Not anymore! This pretty towel really does stop you from slipping. I’m doing yoga bare-footed! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Did not prevent me from slipping during poses
customer_reviews.text: I really hate to leave product reviews but this mat did not work for me. I could be dripping sweat and still slip and slide everywhere. I mist the mat before use and it still doesn't help. The towel definitely sticks to the mat though, I just don't stick to the towel. I've had the towel for almost a year now and I would rather slip on my mat than use the towel. It did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shaudi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you’re doing yoga for beginners but if you move around a lot unfortunately I haven’t figured out how to stop the towel from crinkling up and moving with me
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These are great towels. I like that the nonslip synthetic is actually sewn into the towel. I probably won’t put them in the dryer just to take care of the investment. I like the pockets that fit over the mat. What a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Mama!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent towel for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from my 1st hot yoga class. I bought this towel bc of the reviews & price. I really didn’t know what my needs would be & I didn’t want to spend $58 on a yogitoes towel. I have a manduka pro mat and this towel fit my manduka pro perfectly. I did not spray my mat prior to class (some reviewers suggested this). This towel worked perfectly. It gripped, I gripped. Perfect union. I will be buying a few more for this price & bc I liked hot yoga and plan to go again.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: It slips - but seller remedied immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product as the product review were amazing. As soon as I got it, I tried it on a yoga mat and bummer..... it slipped. BUT, seller contacted me immediately and suggested that I spray the towel with water, the wetter, non-slippery it is and IT WORKED! In addition to that, they sent me their yoga mat that was sitting in a warehouse and WOW - their yoga mat is AWESOME!! If you are in a market for the yoga mat, try their brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hot yoga. I bought an extra as a gift. They're selling the same towels at CorePower for $58.00. There have been reviews complaining about the smell and that has not been my experience. I do launder my gym clothes and towels with sport wash.
customer_reviews.author: sara jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great yoga mat! I usually use Manduka towels and this is my first time purchasing a different brand. I was a little skeptical, as the price is much lower than Manduka. But the quality is not any less! I use it for hot yoga, and it soaks up my sweat and doesn't slip under my fingers. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot yoga classes
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mat towel so much that I bought multiples in different colors. Even through the sweatiest, most active hot power yoga sessions, this towel stays put and absorbs every drop of sweat that lands on it. It fits my mat perfectly, and is very easy to wash (the little carrying bag is a nice addition). I will never do hot yoga without one of these towels again!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of hot yoga - this towel is amazing for that. Stops my hands and feet from slipping around when things get sweaty. It stays in place for regular movements - only time it has moved is if I kick it accidentally in standing poses. Bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kuranda

customer_reviews.title: So far, very good!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Fits my mat just right. I haven’t washed it yet but will follow directions to prevent any shrinkage. Still hasn’t undergone strenuous use yet so I can’t tell how it performs I n my practice. I’ve received positive interest in it though from fellow practitioners.
customer_reviews.author: Glendoragal

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, but can’t find a yoga mat to fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a towel mat before so I wasn’t sure exactly to what to expect. My yoga mats are slightly smaller than than the towel cover so I have had to safety pin it which may be why it tends to bunch up. I like the feel of it & can do yoga barefoot without my feet sticking to the mat. I’m on the lookout for a yoga mat that will fit this towel cover now but have had little success. 4 stars only because I don’t have & can’t find a mat for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: M.P

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I did A LOT of research on buying my first towel - too much. It took me months to buy one. The price range and options were just overwhelming. Finally, after someone suggested this, I made the purchase! No slip. Good skin grip. My mat is 68x24x5mm so it is longer than a standard mat, but that does not cause it to move. Perfect for hot yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my yoga and hot/warm yoga practice so much better! I do not slip when I sweat, so I am able to focus on the poses and meditation more than my safety and wondering if I’ll slip. I wash and dry it regularly and does not change the texture. Also it comes with the perfect bag for it. I can fit a small bag for my phone, card, the refillable spray bottle and a large water bottle easily. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hot yoga Mat, bag and bottle! get it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in pink and love it, but I wrote the company because I didn't get the bag or bottle. To my surprise the company sent me the mint colored one for free and it came with the bag and bottle. i couldn't be happier! Great product! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Towel is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this towel. It is non slip for my pilates and very comfortable to do my practice on. It absorbs sweat and wicks it away. I love the convenience of folding it up and sling the bag over my shoulder and when needed I throw it in the washer, line dry and am good to go. I highly recommend this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It fit over my yoga mat with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It fit over my yoga mat with a little room to spare. The quality of this product is very good. I have washed it and found it to hold it shape and color well. I followed the tips that came along with the yoga towel. Thanks for the great tips in caring for this product.
customer_reviews.author: BJMack

customer_reviews.title: Summertime Use
customer_reviews.text: This mat has been perfect for all the outdoor yoga available in summer. This mat is extremely light and is much better than a towel on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga mat towel, but not for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I practice Hot Yoga, and I sweat quite a lot during class. Instead of absorbing the sweat, this yoga towel seemed to simply pool it. I was making squishing sounds every time I moved during the floor series. Also, be warned, if you buy the extra long length and your mat also happens to be a bit wider than a standard yoga mat, the pockets won't fit over the edges to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie N.

customer_reviews.title: Rough material
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for one yoga practice. It is not as soft as I expected it to be. Doing forearm planks is uncomfortable and feels like I’m getting rug burn. I have three stars because it didn’t slip. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: BUY. THIS. NOW.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this yoga towel! I began yoga this summer and didn't invest in "equipment" until I knew I was going to stick with it. Now I am hooked and was envious of others in my classes with more functional towels and mats. Especially if you do hot yoga or if you like for there to be separation between you and your mat--- this towel is terrific. The four corners fit perfectly over the corners of my mat- the towel is soft but absorbant and it looks terrific as a bonus. Don't look further- I wasted money on a yoga towel before that will now belong to my husband. This thing is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ware

customer_reviews.title: Great for slippy hands!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was totally new to Ashtanga Yoga, and my hands kept slipping on the mat. My Yoga teacher recommended a towel, but this one exceeded my expectations! It has a great surface which doesn't feel overly sticky to the touch, but definitely gives your feet and hands a lot of extra grip. I can concentrate on the yoga now (which is hard!), without the worry or extra strain of slipping on the mat. The included bag and spray water bottle are a nice touch too! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Edison Albert

customer_reviews.title: great product and price point
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga towel. I have been doing hot yoga almost daily and this towel prevents me from slipping on my mat. The bag it comes with is perfect. It holds the towel and a workout outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this towel is long enough for me- I’m 6’ so my mat is longer than the average person’s. This towel fits my extra long mat perfectly and is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slip at all!
customer_reviews.text: I am such a yoga beginner so I need all the help I can get. My hands sweat so much during class. This towel is awesome keeps hands dry and feet in place. Even my instructor was suprised that it worked so well. Loving my towel. I may get another one as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: The Mama of 2

product_meta.title: Heathyoga Non Slip Yoga Towel, Exclusive Corner Pockets Design, Microfiber and Silicone Coating Layer, Free Carry Bag and Spray Bottle, Perfect for Hot Yoga, Bikram and Pilates
feature_bullets: Innovative Microfiber Material: More expensive but worth it. Not every yoga towel has the Dual-Grip two-sided feature. Microfiber and Silicone coating combination is the latest technological improvement to the traditional single microfiber yoga towel. The specially designed "grip-grid" texture ensures stability and helps you hold poses longer and sturdier.

Exclusive Corner Pockets Design: No more repositioning or distractions. The special designed corner pockets hook onto the corners of your mat, so when fully engaged, the towel is taut and will stay firmly in place, which allows you to fully focus your mind and body on the yoga practice.

Premium Microfiber: The Yoga towel is made with super absorbent, soft and moisture wicking microfiber that soaks up moisture and sweat like a giant sponge. Perfect for those who sweat and especially for Hot Yoga, Bikram Yoga, and Power Yoga practitioners. In fact, the more you sweat, the more grippy the towel gets!
2 Size Available: 72" x 26" / 68" x 24", suitable for most yoga mats. Free carry bag with a cotton rope closure, easy to carry. The bag is large enough to place a hand towel, keys and cell phone etc.

Specialized Yoga Brand: Being a professional yoga product manufacturer for over 10 years, we have been and still continuing to source our planet for the best materials to guarantee our customer total satisfaction. Please visit Heathyoga Amazon store for more product offerings.
